mapper.insert:
insert into expedia_rooms_images (hotel_id, room_id, hero_image, group_en, `group`, category_id, category_en, caption, small_size_url, large_size_url) values
(#{item.hotelId},#{item.roomId},#{item.heroImage},#{item.groupEn},#{item.group}, #{item.categoryId},#{item.categoryEn},#{item.caption},#{item.smallSizeUrl},#{item.largeSizeUrl})
